title: The London Gap Year: English A1 Narrative Course
description: Follow Mateo's journey in London while learning the essentials of English A1.

modules.title: Arrival & Survival
modules.description: Units 1-10: Mateo arrives at Heathrow and settles in a hostel.

modules.title: The New Home
modules.description: Units 11-20: Mateo explores his neighborhood and finds a permanent room.

modules.title: City Life
modules.description: Units 21-30: Navigating London and establishing a routine.

modules.title: Socializing & Flavor
modules.description: Units 31-40: Meeting friends and discovering British food and pub culture.

modules.title: The Job Hunt
modules.description: Units 41-50: Writing a CV and landing the first job.

modules.title: Londoner Status
modules.description: Units 51-60: Becoming a true Londoner and looking towards the future.
